mapper.select:
SELECT EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AS cityCd /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_NM AS cityNm /* 도시 명, VARCHAR2(50) */ ,EZC_CITY_CD.COORD_Y AS coordY /* 위도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CITY_CD.COORD_X AS coordX /* 경도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CITY_CD.DISP_ORDER AS dispOrder /* 정렬순서, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CITY_CD.USE_YN AS useYn /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_CITY_CD.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CITY_CD.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_CITY_CD.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CITY_CD.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_CITY_CD.USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10), EZC_CITY_CD_PK(P),SYS_C0011267(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_CITY_CD.USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_NM = #{cityNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 명, VARCHAR2(50) */
AND EZC_CITY_CD.COORD_Y = #{coordY, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 위도, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CITY_CD.COORD_X = #{coordX, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 경도, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CITY_CD.DISP_ORDER = #{dispOrder, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 정렬순서, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CITY_CD.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CITY_CD.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_CITY_CD.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CITY_CD.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* SQL Body Start */ SELECT EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AS cityCd /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_NM AS cityNm /* 도시 명, VARCHAR2(50) */ ,EZC_CITY_CD.COORD_Y AS coordY /* 위도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CITY_CD.COORD_X AS coordX /* 경도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CITY_CD.DISP_ORDER AS dispOrder /* 정렬순서, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CITY_CD.USE_YN AS useYn /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_CITY_CD.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CITY_CD.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_CITY_CD.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CITY_CD.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_CITY_CD.USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_NM = #{cityNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 명, VARCHAR2(50) */
AND EZC_CITY_CD.COORD_Y = #{coordY, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 위도, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CITY_CD.COORD_X = #{coordX, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 경도, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CITY_CD.DISP_ORDER = #{dispOrder, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 정렬순서, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CITY_CD.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CITY_CD.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_CITY_CD.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CITY_CD.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD DESC /* SQL Body End */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_CITY_CD SET /* 도시 코드 */ CITY_NM = #{cityNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 명, VARCHAR2(50) */ ,COORD_Y = #{coordY, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 위도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,COORD_X = #{coordX, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 경도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,DISP_ORDER = #{dispOrder, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 정렬순서, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ WHERE 1=1 AND CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
